artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with a trifold hand-colored engraving of two belt buckles on the left; two women in the center shown from the waist up in elaborate hats; and on the right a woman in a white and green striped gown holding a pink fan with a blue hat with white ribbon and bow and white plumes
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Troisième Année, Vingt-deuxième Cahier, 20 Juin 1788
